meanings.definition: A photograph or image produced by X-rays.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the roentgenogram of my broken bone.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps all the roentgenograms in a special file.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a roentgenogram could capture something invisible like an X-ray.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a roentgenogram, revealing hidden details of the past.
meanings.sent5: The roentgenogram of the sun's corona was breathtakingly beautiful.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph or image using X-rays.
meanings.sent1: The technician will roentgenogram your teeth to check for cavities.
meanings.sent2: They roentgenogrammed the antique vase to see if it was authentic.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if we can roentgenogram a plant to see its roots.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to roentgenogram her memories to preserve them forever.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologists decided to roentgenogram the ancient artifact for further study.
